alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:40AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rooks, Smith, Osborne and Phillips Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Logan to 7 miles north of Woodston to near Natoma. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kirwin around 150 AM CDT. Speed around 155 AM CDT. Cedar around 200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Prairie View, Kensington, Smith Center and Athol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
